drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.ingredients: Mint leaves, Lime, Sugar, Rum, Soda water
drinks.procedure: Muddle mint leaves with lime and sugar. Add rum and top with soda water.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.ingredients: Tequila, Lime juice, Triple sec, Salt
drinks.procedure: Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice. Serve in a salt-rimmed glass.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.ingredients: Bourbon or Rye whiskey, Sugar, Bitters, Orange twist
drinks.procedure: Muddle sugar and bitters. Add whiskey and ice. Stir and garnish with an orange twist.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.ingredients: Vodka, Triple sec, Cranberry juice, Lime juice
drinks.procedure: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.ingredients: Rum, Coconut cream, Pineapple juice
drinks.procedure: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.ingredients: Gin or Vodka, Dry vermouth, Lemon twist or Olive
drinks.procedure: Stir gin and vermouth with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients: Rum, Lime juice, Simple syrup
drinks.procedure: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.ingredients: Whiskey, Lemon juice, Simple syrup, Egg white (optional)
drinks.procedure: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.ingredients: Gin, Campari, Sweet vermouth
drinks.procedure: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.ingredients: Rum, Lime juice, Orgeat syrup, Orange liqueur
drinks.procedure: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with mint.

drinks.name: Bloody Mary
drinks.ingredients: Vodka, Tomato juice, Lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Hot sauce, Salt, Pepper
drinks.procedure: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with celery.

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.ingredients: Rye whiskey, Sweet vermouth, Bitters
drinks.procedure: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.ingredients: Vodka, Lime juice, Ginger beer
drinks.procedure: Combine all ingredients in a copper mug with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.ingredients: Gin, Tonic water, Lime wedge
drinks.procedure: Pour gin over ice in a glass. Top with tonic water and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.ingredients: Tequila, Orange juice, Grenadine
drinks.procedure: Pour tequila and orange juice into a glass with ice. Add grenadine and let it settle.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Gin, Triple sec, Lemon juice, Simple syrup, Cola
drinks.procedure: Combine all ingredients except cola in a glass with ice. Top with cola and stir.

drinks.name: Aperol Spritz
drinks.ingredients: Aperol, Prosecco, Soda water
drinks.procedure: Combine all ingredients in a glass with ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.name: French 75
drinks.ingredients: Gin, Lemon juice, Simple syrup, Champagne
drinks.procedure: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a glass and top with champagne.

drinks.name: Mint Julep
drinks.ingredients: Bourbon, Mint leaves, Sugar, Water
drinks.procedure: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and water. Add bourbon and ice. Stir and garnish with mint.

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.ingredients: Gin, Lemon juice, Simple syrup, Soda water
drinks.procedure: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a glass and top with soda water.
